traits.name: Pack Tactics
traits.description: The shark has Advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the shark's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn't have the Incapacitated condition.

traits.name: Water Breathing
traits.description: The shark can breathe only underwater.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +4, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 7 (2d4 + 2) Piercing damage.
